title: Daily Routine 2
sentences: I stop working at five PM.
Nach der Arbeit kaufe ich im
After work, I shop at the supermarket.
I prepare dinner for my family.
What nice thing are you cooking today?
We usually eat around seven PM.
After the meal, I tidy up the kitchen.
Do you help with the dishes?
Danach ruhe ich mich ein wenig
Afterwards, I rest a little bit.
Do you like to watch TV in the evening?
I often read a book on the sofa.
Do you like to listen to music to relax?
I talk on the phone briefly with my mother.
Um zweiundzwanzig Uhr gehe ich ins
At ten PM I go to bed.
First I put on my pajamas.
Ich putze mir noch einmal die
I brush my teeth once more.
Are you setting an alarm clock for tomorrow?
I turn off the light in the room.
Do you sleep well at night?
I need at least eight hours of sleep.
On the weekend I like to sleep in.
I close the windows in the evening.
Are you taking the trash out too?
Ich decke mich mit einer warmen
I cover myself with a warm blanket.
dictionary:
aufhören - to stop
nach Hause - home
der Supermarkt - supermarket
das Abendessen - dinner
kochen - to cook
aufräumen - to tidy up
der Abwasch - dishes / washing up
das Geschirr - dishes / crockery
sich ausruhen - to rest / relax
fernsehen - to watch TV
das Buch - book
die Musik - music
sich entspannen - to relax
das Bett - bed
der Schlafanzug - pajamas
Zähne putzen - to brush teeth
der Wecker - alarm clock
das Licht - light
einschlafen - to fall asleep
träumen - to dream
gut - well / good
die Stunde (Pl. Stunden) - hour
ausschlafen - to sleep in
das Fenster (Pl. Fenster) - window
der Müll - trash / garbage
die Decke - blanket
schlafen - to sleep
der Tag - day
